display_long_description:
Shomkey – The Ultimate VR Tag Adventure!
Get ready for an exhilarating VR experience like no other! Shomkey is a fast-paced multiplayer game where agility, strategy, and skill determine who comes out on top. Using intuitive physics-based movement, you’ll climb, swing, and bounce your way through thrilling environments in a game of tag like you’ve never seen before.

Explore the World of Shomkey
🌲 The Forest – An underground world full of tall, climbable trees, hidden tunnels, and strategic spots for both escaping and ambushing your opponents. Use your surroundings to gain the upper hand as you leap from tree to tree, dodging those chasing you.

🏠 The Lobby – The heart of the game, where players gather before matches, check leaderboards, and interact. Customize your settings, chat with friends, and prepare for your next big chase.

🛍️ The Shop – Want to stand out? The in-game shop lets you customize your character with a variety of hats, cosmetics, and accessories. Whether you want to look cool, goofy, or downright mysterious, there’s something for everyone!
